title: 填写表格 Filling out the forms

conversations.english: Ladies and gentlemen. It's about time to land in New York. Here are a couple of forms for you to fill out.女士们，先生们，我们即将到达纽约，这有几张表需要你们填一下。
conversations.chinese: 女士们，先生们，我们即将到达纽约，这有几张表需要你们填一下。
conversations.reply_english: What forms must we fill out, Miss?是什么表啊，小姐？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是什么表啊，小姐？

conversations.english: Good afternoon, ladies and gentlemen. The train to Sinchu is arriving in 15 minutes at platform 5.下午好。各位先生和女士，前往 新竹的火车将在15分钟后到达5号站台。
conversations.chinese: 下午好。各位先生和女士，前往 新竹的火车将在15分钟后到达5号站台。
conversations.reply_english: Did you hear the announcement? Let's go to Platform 5 now.你听到 广播了吗？我们现在去第5站台吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你听到 广播了吗？我们现在去第5站台吧。

conversations.english: We would like to welcome you to Taiwan Airlines. Before the airplane takes off, please pay attention to the video clip on the flight security.欢迎搭乘台湾航空，在飞机起飞前，请注意看飞行安全事项。
conversations.chinese: 欢迎搭乘台湾航空，在飞机起飞前，请注意看飞行安全事项。
conversations.reply_english: The seats are pretty big even though we are in the economy-class section.虽然我们是在经济舱，座位还是蛮大的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 虽然我们是在经济舱，座位还是蛮大的。

title: 宁做桂林人不愿做神仙

conversations.english: Wow! What a beautiful scenic spot! It's so open. And just breathe that fresh air, you can almost taste its freshness.哇！多么漂亮的观光胜地！这么宽广。只要呼吸一下这儿的空气，几乎就能尝到它的新鲜味道。
conversations.chinese: 哇！多么漂亮的观光胜地！这么宽广。只要呼吸一下这儿的空气，几乎就能尝到它的新鲜味道。
conversations.reply_english: You can have a bird view of Guilin City from the top of the mountain.你从山顶可以俯瞰桂林。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你从山顶可以俯瞰桂林。

conversations.english: What a beautiful view.这风景真是太美了！
conversations.chinese: 这风景真是太美了！
conversations.reply_english: It sure is. The Grand Canyon is truly a masterpiece. No man could ever make anything like this.一点儿也不假。大峡谷真是大自然的杰作。世上谁有这个本事呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 一点儿也不假。大峡谷真是大自然的杰作。世上谁有这个本事呢？

conversations.english: Room service.What can I do for you?客房部。我能为您做什么吗？
conversations.chinese: 客房部。我能为您做什么吗？
conversations.reply_english: This is room 2012. Where is my laundry?You promised to send to me this morning.这是房间2012。我送洗的衣服呢？你们承诺今天早晨会送来的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 这是房间2012。我送洗的衣服呢？你们承诺今天早晨会送来的。

conversations.english: Help! Help!救命！救命!
conversations.chinese: 救命！救命!
conversations.reply_english: What's the trouble, ma'am?出什么事了，夫人？
conversations.reply_chinese: 出什么事了，夫人？

conversations.english: I have a complaint to make. I've just been badly treated by a rude maid.我要投诉。一个无理的服务员刚才对我很粗暴。
conversations.chinese: 我要投诉。一个无理的服务员刚才对我很粗暴。
conversations.reply_english: Well,we are sorry to hear that.May I have your name and room number? We will deal with the matter right now.很抱歉。能告诉我您的姓名和房间号吗？我们会立刻处理这件事情。
conversations.reply_chinese: 很抱歉。能告诉我您的姓名和房间号吗？我们会立刻处理这件事情。

title: 你们的自助旅行怎么样

conversations.english: How was your self-help trip?你们的自助旅行怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 你们的自助旅行怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Excellent. As soon as we landed, we boarded a bus to Disneyland.I love Mickey Mouse. Janet and I spent the entire first day going on all of the rides.一切都如愿，我们一下飞机就坐车去迪斯尼乐园，我喜欢米老鼠。吉尼特和我第一天全天都在乐园里坐各种乘坐装置游玩。
conversations.reply_chinese: 一切都如愿，我们一下飞机就坐车去迪斯尼乐园，我喜欢米老鼠。吉尼特和我第一天全天都在乐园里坐各种乘坐装置游玩。

conversations.english: I am looking for a comfortable convenient way to see the country.我想找一种舒适方便的方法来游览这个国家。
conversations.chinese: 我想找一种舒适方便的方法来游览这个国家。
conversations.reply_english: Have you heard of motor coaching? It's one of the fastest-growing segments for the travel industry.你听说过乘大客车旅行吗?这是旅行业增长最快的一个方向。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你听说过乘大客车旅行吗?这是旅行业增长最快的一个方向。

conversations.english: Hi. Chuck. Nice to see you back at work. How was your trip to China?你好，查克，很高兴看到你回来上班。你的中国之行怎么样啊？
conversations.chinese: 你好，查克，很高兴看到你回来上班。你的中国之行怎么样啊？
conversations.reply_english: It was so great that I wish I could stay longer.简直太棒了！我希望我能在那儿再待一段时间．
conversations.reply_chinese: 简直太棒了！我希望我能在那儿再待一段时间．

conversations.english: What can I do for you?需要帮忙吗？
conversations.chinese: 需要帮忙吗？
conversations.reply_english: My wife and I want to see the places of interest in Shenzhen, Guangzhou and Zhuhai. Can you arrange a tour for us?我和我的夫人想看看深圳、广州和珠海的名胜古迹，你能为我们安排一次旅行吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我和我的夫人想看看深圳、广州和珠海的名胜古迹，你能为我们安排一次旅行吗？

title: 我是太平洋旅行社的导游

conversations.english: Good evening, sir. Are you Mr. Jim Stewart from the States?晚上好，先生。您是美国来的吉姆·史怀特先生吗？
conversations.chinese: 晚上好，先生。您是美国来的吉姆·史怀特先生吗？
conversations.reply_english: Ah, yes, that's right.是的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。

title: 去美国旅游有什么可推荐的

conversations.english: I hear you are planning to travel abroad.我听说你要到国外去旅行。
conversations.chinese: 我听说你要到国外去旅行。
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I'm going to the Untied States for travel. What places do you recommend?是的，我要去美国旅游。有什么可以推荐的？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我要去美国旅游。有什么可以推荐的？

conversations.english: Has the train come yet?火车到了吗？
conversations.chinese: 火车到了吗？
conversations.reply_english: No, I‘ve been waiting for ages.没有，我也是等了好半天了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 没有，我也是等了好半天了。

conversations.english: How many ports do we call at on our passage?我们一路上要在几个港口停留？
conversations.chinese: 我们一路上要在几个港口停留？
conversations.reply_english: Four ports.4个港口。
conversations.reply_chinese: 4个港口。

conversations.english: What a good day!天气真好啊！
conversations.chinese: 天气真好啊！
conversations.reply_english: Yes. It's really wonderful here The grass is greener and the air is fresher than those in the city.是的。这里太好了。草地比城市里的绿，空气也比城市里的清新。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。这里太好了。草地比城市里的绿，空气也比城市里的清新。

conversations.english: Have you been to Shanghai before?你以前去过上海吗？
conversations.chinese: 你以前去过上海吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes I have. I’ve been there three times in the past year.是的我去过。我在过去这些年里一共去了三次。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的我去过。我在过去这些年里一共去了三次。

title: 团队预定给特别的折扣

conversations.english: Hello. This is the Holiday Inn. Can I help you?您好，这里是假日旅店。我能帮您什么？
conversations.chinese: 您好，这里是假日旅店。我能帮您什么？
conversations.reply_english: Hi. Is there a special rate for a group reservation?你好。如果团队预定是否有特别的折扣？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好。如果团队预定是否有特别的折扣？

title: 从加拿大飞过来一定累坏了

conversations.english: Ms. Wang, this is Mr. Cooper, president of Ivy Publishing.王小姐，这位是古柏先生，是常春藤出版公司的总裁。
conversations.chinese: 王小姐，这位是古柏先生，是常春藤出版公司的总裁。
conversations.reply_english: It's nice to meet you, Mr. Cooper.幸会，古柏先生。
conversations.reply_chinese: 幸会，古柏先生。

conversations.english: Hi, darling! I have a one-month vacation saved up. How about a trip to Europe?亲爱的，我攒了一个月的假，咱们去欧洲玩玩吧？
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，我攒了一个月的假，咱们去欧洲玩玩吧？
conversations.reply_english: I could go for that. But I'm afraid our budget is a little tight this year.这主意不错，但我们今年的预算挺紧的．
conversations.reply_chinese: 这主意不错，但我们今年的预算挺紧的．

conversations.english: Hello, Sara are you finished packing yet? Do you need a hand?萨拉，收拾好了吗？要我帮忙吗?
conversations.chinese: 萨拉，收拾好了吗？要我帮忙吗?
conversations.reply_english: Thanks. Dad, but I can manage it myself.不用，我自己能行，
conversations.reply_chinese: 不用，我自己能行，

conversations.english: Finally we're on board!终于上飞机了啊！
conversations.chinese: 终于上飞机了啊！
conversations.reply_english: Yes. It was so crowded. I'm worn-out. Let's find our seats.是啊，真挤，累死我了，先找座位吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，真挤，累死我了，先找座位吧。

conversations.english: Wow! You're going to Tibet?哇!你们要去西藏？
conversations.chinese: 哇!你们要去西藏？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, my brothe and I are going. We just finished making our itinerary.是的,我和我哥哥去,刚定好行程。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的,我和我哥哥去,刚定好行程。

conversations.english: What a nice day!天气真好啊!
conversations.chinese: 天气真好啊!
conversations.reply_english: Yes. How about going out and enjoying the sunshine on the grass?是啊，去草坪晒晒太阳吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，去草坪晒晒太阳吧。

title: 我们打算周六去香格里拉

conversations.english: What's wrong, Jerry? You look so upset.杰瑞,你怎么了？看上去很不高兴.
conversations.chinese: 杰瑞,你怎么了？看上去很不高兴.
conversations.reply_english: To be honest, I was just dumped.老实说，我被甩了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 老实说，我被甩了。

conversations.english: Do I need a visa?我需要签证吗？
conversations.chinese: 我需要签证吗？
conversations.reply_english: No, I shouldn't think so. But you must take your passport of course.不，我认为你不需要。但是你必须带上护照，这是当然的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，我认为你不需要。但是你必须带上护照，这是当然的。

title: 下个星期我去伦敦几天

conversations.english: I have to go up to London for a couple of days next week. Would you like to come?下个星期我必须去伦敦几天。你想一起来吗？
conversations.chinese: 下个星期我必须去伦敦几天。你想一起来吗？
conversations.reply_english: That would be nice. How are you getting there?不错。你要怎么去那里？
conversations.reply_chinese: 不错。你要怎么去那里？

conversations.english: Would you recommend some places for sightseeing?推荐几个观光的好去处好吗？
conversations.chinese: 推荐几个观光的好去处好吗？
conversations.reply_english: How about Great Canyon?大裂谷怎么样？
conversations.reply_chinese: 大裂谷怎么样？

conversations.english: Hi, ladies. Thanks for picking me up. It's awful weather out there!女士，您好。谢谢来接我。现在的天气很糟糕。
conversations.chinese: 女士，您好。谢谢来接我。现在的天气很糟糕。
conversations.reply_english: Absolutely. It's been raining for hours.是这样的。已经下了几个小时的雨了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是这样的。已经下了几个小时的雨了。

conversations.english: Lili, let’s take a vacation!莉莉，我们去度假吧!
conversations.chinese: 莉莉，我们去度假吧!
conversations.reply_english: George, how can we? Vacations cost money. And this month we don’t have much money left after paying the rent.乔治，我们怎么去得了？度假要花钱。而这个月我们付清房租后就所剩无几了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 乔治，我们怎么去得了？度假要花钱。而这个月我们付清房租后就所剩无几了。

conversations.english: So, what do you think? Mom.妈妈，你认为呢？
conversations.chinese: 妈妈，你认为呢？
conversations.reply_english: Do you also want to stay in Beijing, visiting cultural relics?你也想待在北京吗,去参观一些文化遗址吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你也想待在北京吗,去参观一些文化遗址吗？

conversations.english: Excuse me? Do you have anything for a carsickness?打扰了。你有晕车药吗？
conversations.chinese: 打扰了。你有晕车药吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, but you look fine.是的，有，但是你看起来很好。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，有，但是你看起来很好。

conversations.english: Daddy, do you mind helping me prepare the supplies for mountain climbing.爸爸，能帮我一起准备爬山的装备吗？
conversations.chinese: 爸爸，能帮我一起准备爬山的装备吗？
conversations.reply_english: OK. I am coming.好的，这就来。
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，这就来。

conversations.english: Daddy, how are you going to spend your weekends?爸爸，你准备怎么过周末呢？
conversations.chinese: 爸爸，你准备怎么过周末呢？
conversations.reply_english: I need to finish my research paper.我需要完成我的科研论文。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我需要完成我的科研论文。

title: 参观祖国的文化遗产 Cultural Relics

conversations.english: So, Ben, what do you think we should go for our vacation?本，这个假期，你觉得我们该去哪儿？
conversations.chinese: 本，这个假期，你觉得我们该去哪儿？
conversations.reply_english: I prefer staying in Beijing.我觉得还是待在北京好。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我觉得还是待在北京好。

title: 我本该提前去买票的 In advance

conversations.english: You should have been at home and enjoyed a big meal.你本应该呆在家里享受丰盛大餐的。
conversations.chinese: 你本应该呆在家里享受丰盛大餐的。
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I should have gone to buy the ticket in advance. But now...是啊。我当时应该提前去买票的，但是现在......
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊。我当时应该提前去买票的，但是现在......

title: 我们可以及时赶到机场吗

conversations.english: Do you think we can get to the airport by 8 o'clock?我们能及时到机场吗？
conversations.chinese: 我们能及时到机场吗？
conversations.reply_english: We should make it, if there isn't too much traffic.如果交通不太拥挤，我们可以赶到。
conversations.reply_chinese: 如果交通不太拥挤，我们可以赶到。

title: 我要买张经济舱机票 One economy, please

conversations.english: Good morning. Can I help you?早上好。我能帮您吗？
conversations.chinese: 早上好。我能帮您吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. Do you have any seats available on a flight for Beijing leaving at 15:16?请问15点16分去北京的航班还有没有票?
conversations.reply_chinese: 请问15点16分去北京的航班还有没有票?
